Name: ControlOperation
Description: Description of a Control Operation used to facilitate data control.

Name: CleaningOperation
Description: Description of a Cleaning Operation such as consistency checking, invalid or out of range values, etc.

Name: WeightingReference
Description: Description of the weighting process and any resultant standard weights.

Name: DataAppraisalInformation
Description: Description of the data appraisal processing including the resultant sampling error and response rate.

Name: ProcessingInstructionReference_GeneralInstruction
Description: Reference to a processing instruction (GeneralInstruction or GenerationInstruction) used during the processing event. The basic Reference structure is extended to allow for the use of ParameterLinkage to link specific source parameters to the InParameter of the instruction to reflect its use within this specific Processing Event.

Name: ProcessingInstructionReference_GenerationInstruction
Description: Reference to a processing instruction (GeneralInstruction or GenerationInstruction) used during the processing event. The basic Reference structure is extended to allow for the use of ParameterLinkage to link specific source parameters to the InParameter of the instruction to reflect its use within this specific Processing Event.

Name: QualityStatementReference
Description: Reference to a quality statement relating to the processing event.
